name: Crashing Carts
description:
Hi,

this is crashing carts v1.0 and its a co-op adventure game, strategic and fun to play with your friends on the couch! On player plays on the keyboard, the other on a controller. 

The goal is to get more points than your enemy, by collecting and buying the right products from the supermarket! High risk, high reward!

(1 week project) (actually it was a week and 2 days)
